column1: Little Goat Diner////This place never disappoints. I had a friend visiting from out of town
column2: and I brought him knowing it would be a hit. They have a huge selection on their menu for brunch and lunch
column3: and the pricing is definitely fair for the amazing quality and quantity of food. I would definitely make a reservation
column4: because there always is a wait. We had one and our table was even running a bit behind
column5: but the staff was very friendly and apologetic. I'll definitely be back again.
